/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in vibrant hues of yellow and orange, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. 

Parked cars line the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the clear blue sky. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
